rows.label: qst106007_msg0002
rows.name:
How is text? Is Hana-san
understanding properly?

rows.label: qst106007_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes! Hana understand all
about importance of forests!

rows.label: qst106007_msg0004
rows.name:
Forest and trees is important
for build houses to live in and
furniture for everyday life...

rows.label: qst106007_msg0005
rows.name: Not just place for monsters to live!

rows.label: qst106007_msg0007
rows.name:
Trees of forest also help purify
water and even prevent natural
disaster like landslides.

rows.label: qst106007_msg0008
rows.name:
Not to mention provide
beautiful relaxing sight
to heal hearts of people!

rows.label: qst106007_msg0009
rows.name:
Hana understand. Is like scales
fall from eyes of Hana!

rows.label: qst106007_msg0010
rows.name:
Congratulations, Hana-san. You
successfully learned forestry!

rows.label: qst106007_msg0011
rows.name:
Now time for second period lesson.
Next up is observation class.

rows.label: qst106007_msg0012
rows.name:
We take short break first,
so please come back when
ready for begin new lesson.
